Tech Stack & Architecture:
Pattern: Strict MVVM. Immutable state (val). Coroutines in viewModelScope. DI: Hilt (constructor injection). UI: 100% Jetpack Compose (Material 3 Expressive). Data: Repository pattern is the single source of truth. Gradle: Use libs.versions.toml. Never downgrade versions.
Navigation 3 Standards: Framework: androidx.navigation3. Do NOT use legacy NavHost or string routes. Components: Use entryProvider, entry<T>, and NavDisplay. State: Manage backstack via NavigationState and Navigator. Pattern: Route objects must be type-safe classes/data classes.
Compose Implementation Standards: Screen Structure: Split into Stateful (receives hiltViewModel, collects state) and Stateless (pure data/lambdas). Previews: Mandatory @Preview for Stateless composables.
Workflow Constraints: Safety: ALWAYS read the file to get the latest context before generating code. Process: Think briefly about the implementation. Outline the plan. Generate the code.
